price: If Allah had known any good in them[11], He would have made them hear, but even if He had made them hear, they would have turned away in aversion.
arabic: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: [11] i.e., real willingness and intention of good.
